attributes.action: For a formal investigation, to identify and prosecute, individuals, guilty of  concealing child abuse by Catholic Priests.
attributes.additional_details:
Whilst some of the Catholic Priests that were guilty of child abuse, have been identified, prosecuted and punished for their crimes by imprisonment.

No investigation has been carried out to identify and prosecute, those individuals responsible for perverting the course of justice, by aiding and abetting these priests in concealing their crimes.

This is a gross injustice to the victims of these crimes.

The Government should implement a formal police investigation, to identify and prosecute the individuals responsible for this cover up.
